College_Summary: Shriram Institute of Technology, Meerut was established in 2007. This article is focussing on its polytechnic college under the name of Shriram polytechnic. Constructed in 2009, this polytechnic college provides a diploma in several fields focussing on practical and industrial knowledge of students. The admission is based on the entrance exam JEECUP. Application mode is offline.

Government Polytechnic College, Shahjahanpur is a public/ government Institute located in Shahjahanpur of Uttar Pradesh State. It is an AICTE approved institution found affiliated to Board of Technical Education, Uttar Pradesh. It is the only government polytechnic college in the district to offer diploma.

PMV Polytechnic is a Government Institute located in Mathura, Uttar Pradesh. PMV Polytechnic College, Mathura is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and is found affiliated to Board of Technical Education, Uttar Pradesh. The polytechnic college offers 5 diploma courses and it has been fuelled with 7 full time faculties, which is situated in an area close to 27 acres. It is one of the very first polytechnic colleges that got established in India.

Government Polytechnic Bijnor was founded in the year of 1978 by great S.K. Aggarwal who made the dream of the honourable Minister of Technical Education “Late Kunwar Satyaweerji” to be true. Currently, the college is imparting diploma level courses in the four core Engineering branches. College motivate students to build their own venture by offering inputs in numerous Entrepreneurship Skill Development Programmes. The polytechnic college has been announced as a Centre of Excellence in the key areas of Engineering and Technology through its 4 core departments.

College_Name: Chhatrapati Shahu Ji Maharaj Government Polytechnic -[CSJMGPA], Ambedkar Nagar
College_Summary: Chhatrapati Shahu Ji Maharaj Government Polytechnic (CSJMGPA) at Ambedkar Nagar is one of the best polytechnic colleges in Uttar Pradesh. It was established in the year 2005. It is affiliated to the Board of Technical Education, Uttar Pradesh and is Approved by AICTE. The college provides variety of full-time diploma Courses in Engineering.

Feroze Gandhi Polytechnic (FGP) at Rae Bareli, Uttar Pradesh is a NAAC accreditation holing institution established in 1974. College offers various diploma courses along with a PGDCA course. Admission into Polytechnic Institution is provided on the basis of score/ score in the JEECUP. Candidates must have passed his/ her 10th &12th exam or its equivalent from a recognised board or University for participation in this entrance exam. Counselling registration for the 8th round (direct admission) has been started recently. It strives to facilitate student placements both for the summer internships and final job placement.

Government Polytechnic situated at Pilibhit in Uttar Pradesh was established in 1989. It is approved by AICTE and is affiliated to the Board of Technical Education, Uttar Pradesh (BTEUP). The college offers diplomas in three courses in the engineering stream. Admission to 1st-year diploma course is based on the state polytechnic entrance exam UPJEE-Polytechnic ranking and basic eligibility criteria is pass 10th-grade with prescribed marks. The lateral entry 2nd-year diploma course admission is based on the BTEUP Polytechnic Exam ranking and basic eligibility is pass with prescribed marks in 12th-grade.

Government Polytechnic Aurai is located in Aurai, Bhadohi Marg, Uttar Pradesh established in 2010. The institute offers DIploma programs in the field of Engineering and Technology. The admission process is completely merit-based through candidates’ scores in UPJEE (UP Polytechnic) entrance exam. Interested candidates have to register themselves online for admission.

Government Polytechnic Barabanki is a government technical education institute which was founded in 1982. The institute offers Diploma Courses in 2 streams across 1 discipline and Post-Graduate Diploma in Marketing & Sales Management. Additionally, the institute offers various short-term vocational courses such as Wireman, Automobile Repairing, Electrician, Hand-Pump Mechanic, etc.

Government Polytechnic, Faizabad, was established by Government of Uttar Pradesh in 1962 for providing technical education to the students. It offers diploma courses in Civil, Mechanical, Electrical Engineering, and PG Diploma in Biotechnology (Tissue Culture) with intake of 60 students in each branch. The admission process takes place only through the merit basis by the merit list prepared based on the marks in the qualifying exam. The placements opportunity of serving as the apprentice is given to each student.

Government Polytechnic College located at Gonda in Uttar Pradesh state was formed in the year 1965. It offers diploma courses in various Engineering branches. It is approved by All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE. The entrance ranking of UPBTE will be required to take admissions at this college with the consideration given to both the basic eligibility and qualifying exam marks. Application Process are to be initiated in the online mode alone. Diploma holders of this institution get decent Placements being the technical oriented course, however might get lesser CTC.

Jawaharlal Nehru Polytechnic (JNLP) is situated in Sitapur that offers various diploma courses in non-financed & self-financed courses. The self-financed Diploma course is offered in Information Technology, Computer Science and Engineering, Mechanical Engineering (production) specializations. Admission is completely merit-based through JEECUP scores. Candidates must pass the 10th examination to be eligible for admission.

Little Flower Polytechnic, Gorakhpur was established in 2010 as a private polytechnic college with the hope of imparting technical education to students and reducing unemployment. The college offers 3-year diploma polytechnic courses across 5 specializations of engineering namely, Civil, Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics and, Chemical Engineering. Class 10th pass with at least 35% marks (for first year admission) and Class 12th pass with science (for direct second year admission) are the prerequisite to get into the diploma courses offered by the institution. The application process is done only in offline mode and based on the ranking secured in entrance.

Government Polytechnic Unnao is offering 5 courses including 2 diploma and 3 PG diploma courses to develop industry ready professional candidates. The college actively participates and supports an open academic climate in the campus. It also adopts several innovative ideas for perpetual development by using methods like strategic planning, benchmarking, and performance monitoring.

Government Polytechnic, Gorakhpur is one of the pioneers in providing technical education in the state of Uttar Pradesh by offering diploma courses. This institute was established by Mr. A. Lindon, the founder, and principal of the institute. The institute was earlier known as Government Technical School and was renamed Government Polytechnic in 1958.

Delhi Public ITI was founded in the year 2007 and situated in Ghaziabad Uttar Pradesh. It is affiliated with NCVT, DGT, Directorate General of Training, Government of India and Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship. The Institute provides education in the field of Draughtsman (Civil), Draughtsman (Mechanical), Electronics, Fitter, Welder and Electrician. Admission in this Institute is on the basis of merit and counselling which is done by State Council of Vocational training UP. Interested candidates can apply to this Institute online.

College_Name: Santosh Institute of Allied Health Sciences, Ghaziabad
College_Summary: Santosh Institute of Allied Health Sciences (SIAHS), Ghaziabad is run by "Maharaji Educational Trust" Public Charitable Trust, managed by service-minded philanthropists. The institute comes under the aegis of Santosh Deemed to be University. At present, SIAHS Ghaziabad offers undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma courses in the discipline of Nursing, Physiotherapy, Medical Lab Technology, X-Ray Technician and many more.

College_Summary: Mahamaya Polytechnic of Information Technology (MMIT), Shamli is a public polytechnic institute established in the year 2017. It has been affiliated by the Board of Technical Education Uttar Pradesh and approved by AICTE. The college offers Diploma in engineering courses across three disciplines under the guidance of experienced faculties. Students after completing their studies from this institute get jobs in well-known industries or opt for higher education in reputed institutes.

Seth Ganga Sagar Jatiya Polytechnic-[SGSJP], Bulandshahr

College_Summary: Chaudhary Mukhtar Singh Government Girls Polytechnic (CMSGGP) is a polytechnic college at Meerut in Daurala, Uttar Pradesh. This is a government college operating under the UP government. It was an initiative by U.P government for girls in order to spread technical education to female students though the different missions started by the government for female education and safety. The institution was started on 2004 with three branches like: Electronics, Computer Science, and Information Technology to offer diploma level course. Each of these three branches has a maximum intake of up to 60 students per batch.

College_Summary: Devanagari Polytechnic College, Meerut was established in 1956 started off as a private institute and started receiving government aid by 1962. It is situated at the Meerut- Delhi Highway.

College_Summary: Dr. Babasaheb Bhimrao Ambedkar Government Polytechnic, Haidarpur, Auriya was established in November 2010. The Institute offers a Diploma in Mechanical engineering. Admission to this course is done on the basis of marks obtained by the students in their qualifying examinations. Candidates who have passed the 10th examination are eligible to apply.

College_Summary: Shri Rawatpura Sarkar Group of Institutions (SRGOI) is situated in Jhansi. SRGOI is affiliated to Dr A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow and approved by AICTE, NCTE, PCI. The college offers courses in undergraduate and diploma courses in the discipline of Pharmacy, Ayurveda, Education and many more. Admission is done on the basis of the merit.

College_Name: Federal Institute Of Hotel Management - [FIHM], Noida
College_Summary: Federal Institute of Hotel Management, Noida popularly known as FIHM, is an educational institution providing training in the hospitality sector. The institute is ranked among top Hotel Management Colleges in Noida. FIHM is a pan India enterprise with over 52 centres that offers the most advanced, industry focused and cutting edge programs in Hospitality Studies. FIHM is the official academic delivery partner for OTHM qualifications UK and provides overseas internships and placement. There are also over 12 centres offering OTHM UK qualifications which are accompanied by International pathways.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Science [B.Sc] (Airlines, Tourism and Hospitality Management)

The institution offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs. Admission is on the basis of merit and entrance exams. GN Group of Institutes have the following institutes under its umbrella:

College_Summary: Ram-Eesh Group of Institutions, Greater Noida was established in 1997. The institute was inaugurated by the former Governor of UP, Late Shri Vishnukant Shastri. The group of institutions offer various degree and diploma courses in the discipline of Pharmacy, Engineering and Education. Admission is done on the basis of various national and state entrance exams. Apart from the courses, the institute provides excellent placement opportunities to its students. It has a record of providing 100% placement to its students. A total of 160 students enrolled in the academic year 2019-20. The 10% of students get placed in the Industry sector, 25% in Marketing, 30% and 80% in Higher Education- and Entrepreneurship respectively. Some of the top employers include USV, Alembic, Troikaa, GenPact, WNS, InnoData, Alkem, Aelogics, Imperial Biotech, Delkon Technologies, PritamInterantional, Rockman, etc.

College_Summary: Institute of Event Management (IEM), Lucknow provides one of the most detailed structured educational services in the field of event management. It offers Certification, Diploma and PG Diploma courses at the UG and PG levels. Admission to the courses is based on the candidate's performance in the previous qualifying examination. The Course fee for the 6 months Certification course is INR 45,500 and PGDAMEM course fee is INR 1,05,500.

College_Name: Lloyd Institute of Engineering and Technology - [LIET], Greater Noida
College_Summary: Lloyd Institute of Engineering and Technology (LIET), was established in the year 2002. The college is located at Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh and is affiliated to Dr APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University. Moreover, the college is also recognised by AICTE, New Delhi and the Government of Uttar Pradesh. Check: LIET, Greater Noida Courses and Fees

College_Name: Aryakul College of Pharmacy and Research, Sitapur
College_Summary: Aryakul College of Pharmacy and Research, Sitapur was established in 2018 by Aryakul Group of Colleges to keep pace with the present competitive scenario in the pharmaceutical industry. Degree courses at ACPR, Sitapurare affiliated with Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University(AKTU) while diploma courses are affiliated to the Board of Technical Education (BTE) and Homoeopathic Board. All the courses are approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and Pharmacy Council of India (PCI).

College_Name: Metro College of Health Sciences and Research - [MCHSR], Greater Noida

College_Summary: Chitravansham Group of College (CHGC), Prayagraj, established in 2003, is approved by AICTE and PCI. The institute offers various undergraduate and diploma courses in the discipline of Engineering, Pharmacy, Humanities and Science, Law and Nursing. Admission in the CHGC is done purely on the merit basis of the marks scored in the previous qualifying examination. The institute has more than 150 highly qualified and experienced faculties.

College_Name: Sardar Bhagat Singh College of Higher Education, Lucknow
College_Summary: Sardar Bhagat Singh College of Higher Education (SBSCHE) is a private college affiliated to Lucknow University. The college offers undergraduate courses like BA, B.Com., and BBA. Admission in the SBSCHE is based on the marks scored in the previous qualifying examination. The courses of the college follow the syllabus prescribed by the Lucknow University. The well-qualified and highly motivated staff of the college help the students to acquire necessary theoretical and practical knowledge.

College_Name: Modern Girls' College of Professional Studies - [MGCPS], Lucknow
College_Summary: Modern Girls’ College of Professional Studies (MGCPS), Lucknow is a private institute which was established in 2007. It offers undergraduate courses in Management, Commerce, Computer Applications, Journalism and Mass Communication. Admission to MGCPS depends on the performance of the candidates in the last qualifying examination. The faculty at the college are highly qualified and well experienced. The placement record of the college is quite impressive and some of the top recruiters are HCL, Infosys, IBM, HDFC Bank, Godrej, Wipro etc. Check: MGCPS Placements

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Journalism and Mass Communication [BJMC]

College_Name: IEC -Institute Of Hotel Management - [IIHM], Greater Noida
College_Summary: IEC -Institute of Hotel Management, Greater Noida is a private college established in the year of 2011. It offers diploma and undergraduate courses in the discipline of Hotel Management, Catering Technology and Culinary Arts. Admission to IEC IIHM depends on the performance in the last qualifying examination. The faculty at the institute are highly qualified and well experienced. Some of the top recruiters visiting the campus are Radisson, Hilton Hotels & Resorts, Air India, Oberoi Hotels & Resorts, Spice Jet, ITC Hotels etc.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Hotel Management and Catering Technology [BHMCT]

College_Name: Sir Madan Lal Group Of Institutions - [SMGI], Etawah

College_Summary: Sakshi College of Pharmacy was established in 2019 with an aim to impart quality education in the field of Pharmaceutical Sciences. Sakshi Group oF Instituitions is a private organization run by the society Sakshi College of Management & IT. The Society was formed in the year 2009 with the major objective to undertake, promote and execute courses related to diverse fields of education. The college is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi and Pharmacy council of India (PCI), New Delhi and affiliated to the Board of Technical Education (BTE). The college provides Diploma and Bachelor’s degree programs in the field of Pharmacy.

Sharda Group of Institutions (SGI), Agra, established in 1996, is approved and accredited by AICTE, NAAC, PCI, NBA, COA and Govt. of UP. Affiliated to AKTU, it offers undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma courses in the discipline of Engineering & Technology, Management, Computer Application, Education and Pharmacy. Admission to B.Tech is based on valid JEE Main score, whereas admission to M.Tech is based on valid GATE scores. The institution has 4 campuses namely, Hindustan Campus in Mathura, Anand Campus in Agra and Sharda University in Greater Noida.

College_Name: Subharti College of Management & Commerce, Meerut
Shree Ram College Of Pharmacy, Mainpuri
College_Summary: Shree Ram College of Pharmacy (SRCP), Mainpuri is a private college established in 2018, affiliated to the Board of Technical Education, Lucknow and approved by Pharmacy Council of India and AICTE The college offers diploma courses in the discipline of Pharmacy. Admission in the SRCP is done on the basis of the performance of the candidates in the state level entrance exam. Furthermore, the college has highly qualified and well experienced faculty members. As well as the college has state of the art infrastructure which provides various facilities to facilitate the studies of the students.

College_Name: Great Ganges Institute of Technology, Kanpur
College_Summary: Great Ganges Institute of Technology (GGIT) is a private institute established in 2013 in Unnao. This institute is popularly known for its undergraduate courses in the discipline of Computer Application & Management. Admission to the BCA and BBA courses offered by the institute is done based on the performance of the candidates in the Common Entrance Test conducted by the institute itself.

College_Name: IIF College of Commerce and Management Studies, Greater Noida
College_Summary: IIIF College of Commerce & Management Studies (IIF CCMS) was founded by Jyoti Foundation, a Public Charitable Trust with the affiliation of Chaudhary Charan Singh (CCS) University, Meerut. It offers undergraduate programs in the discipline of Business Administration and Commerce. Admission to IIF CCMS depends on the performance of the candidates in the last qualifying examination. The faculty at the college are highly qualified and well experienced.

JDSR Institute of Pharmacy was established in 2018 under the JDSR Education Trust Bareilly. The institution provides AICTE and PCI approved D.Pharm and B.Pharm courses in its curriculum. The faculty of the college is highly qualified and provides the best mentorship to the students.

College_Name: Dr. R.M.L Institute of Pharmacy, Powayan
College_Summary: Dr. RML Institute of Pharmacy is a private college approved by AICTE, PCI and MHRD. It is affiliated with BTE Uttar Pradesh and is spread over an area of more than 3 acres in a peaceful and pollution free environment. It offers undergraduate and diploma courses in the discipline of Pharmacy. Admission to RML Institute of Pharmacy depends on the performance of the candidates in the last qualifying examination. The faculty at the institute are highly qualified and well experienced. Check: Dr. RML Institute of Pharmacy Courses & Fees

College_Name: Guru Teg Bahadur Paramedical Institute, Shahjahanpur
College_Summary: Guru Teg Bahadur Paramedical Institute, established in 2017, is a private institution approved by AICTE and PCI. It is one of the prestigious colleges in Pharmacy offering undergraduate and diploma courses. Admission to GTBPI depends on the performance of the candidates in the last qualifying examination. The faculty at the institute are highly qualified and well experienced.

College_Name: Saroj Institute of Films and Fashion - [SIFF], Lucknow
Kinetic Institute Department of Pharmacy, Shahjahanpur
College_Summary: Kinetic Institute Department of Pharmacy, established in 2018, is a private institute approved by the Pharmacy Council of India and AICTE and is affiliated to AKTU, Lucknow. The institute offers B. Pharma and D. Pharma courses on its premises and admission to the courses are done on the basis of merit. The institute has a placement cell which gives full assistance to the student for summer internships and training.

College_Name: Shri Santan Pal Singh Pharmacy College, Shahjahanpur

College_Summary: Ghausia College of Pharmacy, Fatehpur established in 2019, is affiliated to AKTU, Lucknow and approved by Pharmacy Council of India. The college offers undergraduate and diploma courses in Pharmacy. Admission to the courses offered by the GCP, Fatehpur is done based on the candidate’s performance in the last qualifying exam. The college has a Training and Placement Cell which provides placement assistance to its students during the campus placement.

Utkarsh Business School is situated in Bareilly in Uttar Pradesh state of India. it is accredited from AICTE. Utkarsh Business School, an institute which believes in empowering students with the professional education and to make them compatible for the real world challenges. The college provides the constant improved practical as well as technical knowledge to students beyond the curricula and theory that already exists. This is further enhanced by a learning environment that encourages challenging and innovative methods through emphasis on entrepreneurship development, regular institute industry interaction, frequent workshops, personality development, mentoring and much more. Hostel facility is not available for its students. Additional campus facilities such as Bed, Table are also there.

College_Name: Ambalika Institute of Higher Education - [AIHE], Lucknow
Jagannath Institute of Management Sciences - [JIMS], Noida
College_Summary: Jagannath Institute of Management Sciences, established in 1997 is affiliated with CCS, Meerut, and registered as the Delhi Institute of Higher Education (DIHE). JIMS, Noida is accredited by NAAC with a grade of A++. The institute offers AICTE-approved UG courses such as BBA, BCA, BAJMC, and B.Com (NEP). The Institute has a very illustrious governing board with distinguished Senior Academic and Corporate Advisors from diverse backgrounds.

College_Name: Delhi Institute of Higher Education - [DIHE], Gautam Budh Nagar
College_Summary: Delhi Institute of Higher Education (DIHE) has entered into a strategic association with the prestigious Shri Ram College of Commerce (SRCC) Delhi. SRCC and the Delhi Institute of Higher Education agreed to establish a program for Research, Consultancy and academic cooperation. DIHE offers a PGDM program in Banking And Financial Services, Research And Business Analytics and Marketing & Human Resources. Admission to the DIHE PGDM Course is done based on CAT/MAT/XAT/CMAT scores. The composite scores for MAT are 700 scores and for CAT is 80 Percentile.

The college offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Arts, Commerce, and Education in various specializations. Admission to the courses offered by Ismail PG College is done based on the candidate's performance in the last qualifying examination.

Aastha Institute of Professional Studies, established in 2016, is a private institute offering Bachelors and Diploma courses in the discipline of Education (B.Ed, D.El.Ed). College_Name: Puppets Picture College of Mass Communication
College_Summary: Puppets Picture College of Mass Communication, Noida is affiliated to SVU, Amroha and approved by UGC and AIU. The institute offers UG, PG, and Diploma and Certification courses in the field of Mass Communication, Journalism, Graphics Designing, Professional Photography and Videography, and Advanced level Editing (photo and video). Flagship courses of Puppets Picture College of Mass Communication are their BJMC and MJMC course. Another popular course of the institute is their PGDM course in Mass Communication. Apart from that, the college offers 16 certification courses in subjects like Filmmaking, Modeling, Graphic Design, Animation, Photography, Radio Jockey, etc. Admission to the courses offered by Puppets Picture College is done based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qualifying examination, aptitude test, and interview. The college provides up to 50% Scholarships based on Merit.

College_Name: NHMC, Agra- Naiminath Homoeopathic Medical College
College_Summary: Established in the year 2008, Naiminath Homoeopathic Medical College is the first NABH Accredited Homeopathy institution in India. NHMC is affiliated with Dr. Bhimrao Ambedkar University (DBRAU), Agra. NHMC offers UG and PG courses in the discipline of Homeopathy. The flagship course of the institute is the 4.5 year BHMS course in Homeopathic Medicine and Surgery. The college also runs an MD course across 6 specializations. Admission to NHMC is based on candidate’s performance in the entrance test.

Prayag Institute of Hotel Management and Catering Technology (PIHMCT) is a private hotel management institute located in Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh. It offers B.Sc., M.Sc., MBA, Diploma and Certificate programs in the fields of Hospitality and Hotel Management, Catering, Food Production, etc. It offers placement assistance to students. PIHMCT Allahabad takes admission in two academic sessions from January to July (Winter Session) and July to December (Summer Session). It provides all the necessary facilities to students like hostels, etc.

College_Summary: Shobhit (Deemed to be University) is a self-financed private university located in Meerut, UP. The University is UGG recognised, offering both Undergraduate and Postgraduate programs in the fields of Management and Computer Applications for the students. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate’s performance in national level management entrance exams such as CAT/ MAT/ XAT/ NMAT etc. Graduates from the University are placed in top-notch companies such as Accenture, Godrej, TATA, Mahindra, Byjus, Amazon, Infosys etc.

College_Summary: Martlet Hospitality Institute, Moradabad offers BBA and BHM at the UG level and MBA and MHM at the PG level. The college also offers Diploma and PG Diploma courses in the disciplines of Hospitality, Aviation and Tourism. Admission to all the courses are on the basis of the candidate's performance in the previous qualifying examination. The highest placement package offered to students of Martlet is INR 9.6 LPA. Some of the top recruiters that recruit Martlet's students include Metex and Clarks Exotica. Check: Martlet Hospitality Placement

College_Summary: Max Healthcare Education is a part of Max Healthcare Institute Limited (Max Healthcare) which is one of India’s leading providers of integrated world-class healthcare services. It has a network of 17 state-of-the-art, patient-centric healthcare facilities (3400+ beds) spread across the National Capital Region (NCR) and states of Punjab, Uttarakhand, and Maharashtra. Hospital’s Allied Healthcare courses provide the students with the skills, information, and competencies they need to conduct a variety of medical procedures and grab employment opportunities in the healthcare sector. Max Healthcare Education offers Certification, Diploma and B.Sc courses in various disciplines at the undergraduate level. The technical role and scope in the healthcare business are better understood through live interaction sessions with doctors and professionals. The highest placement package offered to Max Healthcare Education’s students is INR 3.6 LPA. Students are placed in reputable hospitals for clinical posting under the supervision of doctors, technicians, and faculty.

College_Name: ITS College of Professional Studies (ITSCPS), Greater Noida
College_Summary: ITS College of Professional Studies, Greater Noida was established in 2022 and is a private institute which is affiliated to CCSU, Meerut. ITSCPS offers BBA and BCA courses at the undergraduate level. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate's performance in the previous qualifying examination. Some of the top recruiters that recruit ITS CPS students include Infosys, Accenture, Wipro, TCS, Vodafone, Deloitte etc.

The institute is approved by the All India Council of Technical Education, Pharmacy Council of India and Board of Technical Education Uttar Pradesh of Lucknow and affiliated to Atal Bihari Vajpayee Medical University of Lucknow. And with the aim of providing quality education to students, the institute offers various Undergraduate and Diploma courses in the discipline of Nursing, Pharmacy, Physiotherapy and Optometry etc. and admission to these courses is granted to aspirants based on marks obtained by them in 10+2.

The college has collaborated with top-notch brands, foreign institutes including Coventry University, Birchwood University, Europe Institute of Management and Technology and College De Paris along followed by NAAC-A graded UGC approved University for students skills enhancement and providing them the best quality education. Also admission to college’s courses is granted based on the marks of candidates in last year’s qualifying exam and students will also get the option to study abroad in 2nd and 3rd year along with a 3-years work permit.

College_Summary: Ishan Educational Institutions, Greater Noida, established in 1994, is the First College of Greater Noida. The institute offers BBA, B.Com, B.Com (Hons), B.A.M.S, B.Ed., LLB, B.A. + LLB and B.Pharma Courses at the undergraduate level and offers M.Com, M.Ed. and L.L.M. courses at the postgraduate level. The institute also offers Diploma courses in Education. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate’s performance in the entrance exam or based on merit in the previous qualifying exam. The highest placement package offered to Ishan Educational Institute’s students is INR 15 LPA.

College_Summary: Wisdom School of Management is one of the leading Management Institutes having vast and deep experience in counselling students for Distance Learning & Online Programs. It was established in the year 2006 and working under the aegis of WISDOM SCHOOL OF MANAGEMENT TRUST and certified for its quality management systems by ISO 9001:2015 and accredited by IAS and IAF. The Business School offers BA, BBA, B.Com, B.Com (Hons), BMLT, BCA, BJMC, B.Sc, B.Lib.I.Sc and B.Tech courses at the undergraduate level and offers MSW, MA, MBA, M.Com, MCA, MJMC, M.Sc, M.Tech and M.Lib.I.Sc at the postgraduate level. The management school also offers Diploma and PG Diploma courses in various disciplines at the UG and PG level. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate’s performance in entrance exam or merit in the previous qualifying exam.

College_Name: Ishan Ayurvedic Medical College and Research Centre, Greater Noida
College_Summary: Ishan Ayurvedic Medical College is a private institute which came into existence in 2017. The institute is a constituent college of Ishan Educational Institutions and is affiliated to MGG AYUSH University , Gorakhpur. The college offers a B.A.M.S course at the undergraduate level. Admission to the course will be done based on the candidate’s performance in NEET. The institute has been best rated for the Highest Return on Investment (RoI) because of low fee structure and good placements. Ishan Ayurvedic Medical College is also rated among the Top 5 because of Practical Exposure, Curricular and Co-curricular activities.

The institute offers B.Pharm and D.Pharma courses at the undergraduate level. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate’s merit in the previous qualifying examination. The training and placement cell at Ishan Institute aims at providing a 100% placement assistance to its students.

The University is approved by University Grants Commission, All India Council for Technical Education, Bar Council of India, Pharmacy Council of India, and Indian Nursing Council and admission to university courses is granted based on the score obtained by the candidate in the respective Diploma/degree course and work experience of 1-2 years. Shri Venkateshwara University is a constituent institution of and is managed by Venkateshwara Group of Institutions and offers Engineering programs under the School of Engineering (SOE) which ultimately helps professionals to interact and engage with local industries and corporate mentors.

The college is approved by the All-India Council of Technical Education, and Pharmacy Council of India. Admission to BPS courses is granted to students depending on the merit of the previous year’s qualifying exam and score of the BPS Aptitude Test.
